00021 namespace distribution  {

00045 class DiscreteDistribution
00046 {
00047  public:
00051   DiscreteDistribution() { /* nothing to do */ }
00052 
00061   DiscreteDistribution(const size_t numObservations) :
00062       probabilities(arma::ones<arma::vec>(numObservations) / numObservations)
00063   { /* nothing to do */ }
00064 
00071   DiscreteDistribution(const arma::vec& probabilities)
00072   {
00073     // We must be sure that our distribution is normalized.
00074     double sum = accu(probabilities);
00075     if (sum > 0)
00076       this->probabilities = probabilities / sum;
00077     else
00078     {
00079       this->probabilities.set_size(probabilities.n_elem);
00080       this->probabilities.fill(1 / probabilities.n_elem);
00081     }
00082   }
00083 
00087   size_t Dimensionality() const { return 1; }
00088 
00097   double Probability(const arma::vec& observation) const
00098   {
00099     // Adding 0.5 helps ensure that we cast the floating point to a size_t
00100     // correctly.
00101     const size_t obs = size_t(observation[0] + 0.5);
00102 
00103     // Ensure that the observation is within the bounds.
00104     if (obs >= probabilities.n_elem)
00105     {
00106       Log::Debug << "DiscreteDistribution::Probability(): received observation "
00107           << obs << "; observation must be in [0, " << probabilities.n_elem
00108           << "] for this distribution." << std::endl;
00109     }
00110 
00111     return probabilities(obs);
00112   }
00113 
00121   arma::vec Random() const;
00122 
00130   void Estimate(const arma::mat& observations);
00131 
00141   void Estimate(const arma::mat& observations,
00142                 const arma::vec& probabilities);
00143 
00145   const arma::vec& Probabilities() const { return probabilities; }
00147   arma::vec& Probabilities() { return probabilities; }
00148 
00149   /*
00150    * Returns a string representation of this object.
00151    */
00152   std::string ToString() const;
00153 
00154  private:
00155   arma::vec probabilities;
00156 };
